mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran (id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime, percent) values (#{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name},#{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{editBy}, #{editTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}, #{percent})
mapper.select: select t.id, t.name, tc.fullname as contactsId, c.name as customerId, t.type, t.stage, t.owner, t.source from tbl_tran t join tbl_contacts tc on t.contactsId = tc.id join tbl_customer c on t.customerId = c.id

select t.id, t.name, t.money, t.stage, t.percent, t.expectedDate, t.type, c.name as customerId from tbl_tran t join tbl_customer c on c.id = t.customerId where t.id in (select tranId from tbl_customer_tran_relation where customerId = #{id})

select t.id, t.owner, t.money, t.name, t.expectedDate, cu.name as customerId, t.stage, t.type, t.source, a.name as activityId, co.fullname as contactsId, t.createBy, t.createTime, t.editBy, t.editTime, t.description, t.contactSummary, t.nextContactTime, t.percent from tbl_tran t join tbl_customer cu on t.customerId = cu.id join tbl_contacts co on co.id = t.contactsId join tbl_activity a on t.activityId = a.id where t.id = #{id}

select t.id, t.owner, t.money, t.name, t.expectedDate, t.customerId ,cu.name as customerName, t.stage, t.type, t.source, t.activityId, a.name as activityName, t.contactsId, co.fullname as contactsName, t.createBy, t.createTime, t.editBy, t.editTime, t.description, t.contactSummary, t.nextContactTime, t.percent from tbl_tran t join tbl_customer cu on t.customerId = cu.id join tbl_contacts co on co.id = t.contactsId join tbl_activity a on t.activityId = a.id where t.id = #{id}
